# makeAsyncIterator()

**Instance Method**

Makes an asynchronous iterator that provides successive device snapshots when the list of paired devices known to the app changes.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeAsyncIterator() -> WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.AsyncIterator
```

## Return Value

A new asynchronous iterator vending [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAPairedDevice/Devices] elements when changes occur.

## Getting async updates

- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.AsyncIterator**: An iterator for the sequence of devices.
- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.Element**: A dictionary holding a snapshot of currently paired devices accessible to your app.
